item.description:
I'll offer to be event organizer for Trivia at Chelmsford Raddisson Hotel, Rte 110, Chelmsford, MA on Wed 6/6/12.

Event starts promptly at 6:30pm, so please arrive by 6:15.

Teams of up to 6 people per table can compete for prizes, If we get 8, we can split into 2 groups.

THis is to be a fun nite, relaxed yet challenging. We tried it out tonite, and we had loads of laughs, and even learned a few things. I'd venture to say that if people are highly competitive and serious about it, they may want to have their own table.

You can word it any way you'd like. Thanks, Gloria
item.how_to_find_us: Look for GG, or meetup signs

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Trivia at the Radisson in Chelmsford
